name: Check an email is disposable or not
title: Check an email is disposable or not
tool_name: Check an email is disposable or not

api_list.name: /check_email_address
api_list.description: This api end point checks whether the email is disposable or not
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://check-an-email-is-disposable-or-not.p.rapidapi.com/check_email_address"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "check-an-email-is-disposable-or-not.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
